comments: From late august: "As with other HCQ prevention trials, HERO-HCQ enrollment has been hindered by commentary from politicians, the media, as well as retracted publications. With all the information out there, it is easy for people to become confused about HCQ. Our message in HERO-HCQ remains the same: HCQ is safe, generally well tolerated, and the question we are asking, is HCQ effective in preventing COVID-19, remains important." https://heroesresearch.org/hero-hcq-continues-to-generate-evidence-on-prophylactic-use-of-hcq/
